channel.title: ObsidianHtml/Documentation
channel.description: The documentation site of ObsidianHtml, a package used to convert Obsidian notes to proper markdown and static HTML websites.

item.title: Log/ Working on an RSS feed for ObsidianHtml
item.description:
This is the documentation for v3.5.0 and lower, for documentation for v4.0.0 and higher, see https://obsidian-html.github.io/v4

No self-publishing system should go without an RSS feed.
item.guid: https://obsidian-html.github.io/Log/Working on an RSS feed for ObsidianHtml.html

item.title: Log/ Published ObsidianHtml version 1.0.0!
item.description:
This is the documentation for v3.5.0 and lower, for documentation for v4.0.0 and higher, see https://obsidian-html.github.io/v4

The first major version of ObsidianHtml! ðŸŽ‰

item.title: Log/ Published ObsidianHtml version 0.0.9!
item.description:
This is the documentation for v3.5.0 and lower, for documentation for v4.0.0 and higher, see https://obsidian-html.github.io/v4

Lots of new features, like: graph view, backlinks, index from tags, image scaling, temporary vault copy.

item.title: Changelog/ v3.2.3
item.description: Patch version of v3.2.0.

item.title: Changelog/ v1.0.0
item.description:
Version 1.0.0 has been released.

The changes related to the prior version can be found here: https://github.com/obsidian-html/obsidian-html/issues/137

item.title: Bugfixes
item.description: Patch version of v3.4.0

item.title: Changelog/ v3.3.0
item.description: Feature version of v3.0.0.

item.title: v2.3.1
item.description:
Patch version of v2.3.0

The css refactor gave rise to a bug where the graph button was always disabled, where that should've only been the case for the taglist.

item.title: v3.1.0
item.description: Feature version of v3.0.0

item.title: v3.0.0
item.description:
Files are now addressed based on full path, instead of filename. This arised from new insights on how Obsidian filepath parsing works. Starting with this version it is thus possible to have, for example, a notes.md file in every folder.

This does require that you turn on Configuration Options#Allow Duplicate Filenames in Root.

item.title: v2.3.0
item.description: Feature version of v2.0.0

item.description: Bugfix version for v2.0.0

item.title: Changelog/ v3.2.2
item.description: Patch version of v3.2.0.

item.title: v2.0.2
item.description: Bugfix version for v2.0.0

item.title: Changelog/ v1.2.0
item.description: Feature version of v1.0.0.

item.title: Changelog/ v1.0.1
item.description:
Patch version of v1.0.0.

It is permitted when using Create Index from Directory Structure to overwrite the index.html.

item.title: Changelog/ v1.0.2
item.description:
Patch version of v1.0.0.

Note: Pypi docs claim there are config changes in this release, but this was reverted. (I can't update the pypi docs without releasing a new version). No config changes in this release!

item.title: Added
item.description:
Feature version of v3.0.0.

Inclusions are now shown in the graph view with dotted edges. See also #425.

item.title: v2.0.0
item.description:
A new major version already. This time mostly for backward compatability reasons.

Upgrading from version 1.x.x to version 2.x.x will neccessitate some config changes if you configured more than the bare minimum and/or if want to keep the same layout as before.

item.title: Changelog/ v3.2.1
item.description:
Patch version of v3.2.0.

This could've been a feature version, but I published this mainly to fix major bugs in v3.2.0.

item.title: Changelog/ v1.2.1
item.description:
bugfix for v1.2.0

In the rewrites the usecase of converting proper markdown directly to html was broken. Not sure if anyone uses it, but it is something that I listed prominently as a feature, so this warrants its own release (and maybe a regression test soon...)

item.title: Changelog/ v1.1.0
item.description: Feature version of v1.0.0.

item.title: v2.1.1
item.description: Patch version of v2.1.0

item.title: v3.0.2
item.description:
Patch version of v3.0.0

Removed md_globals from built-in python-markdown extensions.

item.title: v3.0.3
item.description: Patch version of v3.0.0

item.title: v3.2.0
item.description:
Feature version of v3.0.0.

Normally a feature version doesn't have breaking changes, but in this case it is for miscelaneous tooling that isn't core to the functionality.

item.title: v1.2.2
item.description:
bugfix for v1.2.0

Bugfix for a little bug where a halting error occurs when toggles/verbose_printout is true, due to a faulty concatenation in a print statement somewhere. See also.

item.title: Features added
item.description:
Feature version of v3.0.0.

For all work done for version 3.5.0, see: https://github.com/obsidian-html/obsidian-html/milestone/3
